game.name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern Saluda Grade Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Answer the call and accept one of North America’s greatest and most memorable railroading challenges – with the Saluda Grade: Asheville – Spartanburg route for Train Simulator Classic!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Answer the call and accept one of North America’s greatest and most memorable railroading challenges – with the Saluda Grade: Asheville – Spartanburg route for Train Simulator Classic!
